restaurants.name: Pamfilya
restaurants.description: First class meat, great bread, tiny amounts of sauce and great döner chefs

restaurants.name: Tadim
restaurants.description: Tadim offers an unsurpassed mix of quality between the components of the Döner

restaurants.name: Mustafas Gemüsekebap
restaurants.description: It is a truly great döner prepared with lots of care and precision

restaurants.name: Zweistrom
restaurants.description: The reason the Professor deem Zweistrom worthy of this listing is it's spectacular Falafels and their great sauces.

restaurants.name: Vöner
restaurants.description: Why is it special? Because it's tasty.

restaurants.name: Bistro Bagdad
restaurants.description: Bagdad offers a lovely meat skewer and when the right guys are working it is really one of the tops in Berlin

restaurants.name: Doyum
restaurants.description: Because Doyum offers the best meat in Berlin

restaurants.name: Rüya
restaurants.description: Because it is Berlin chicken döner par excellence

restaurants.name: Don Kebab
restaurants.description: Because it is a fairly decent Martensdöner

restaurants.name: Doy Doy
restaurants.description: Because it is an old acquaitance that don't let you down
